DOC.brief_summary: In order evaluate effect CYP3A5*3 allele pharmacokinetics sildenafil , udenafil , vardenafil , clinical trial use single oral dose conducted Korean healthy male subject whose genotype CYP3A5 determine .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect CYP3A Genetic Polymorphism Pharmacokinetics Phosphodiesterase type5 Inhibitors Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate different effect CYP3A5 genotype pharmacokinetics ( PK ) sildenafil , udenafil , vardenafil healthy male subject . Twenty one healthy male subject CYP3A5*1/*1 , *1/*3 , *3/*3 enrol . An open-label 3-way crossover study perform week washout . A single oral dose PDE5I ( 100 mg sildenafil ; 200 mg udenafil ; 20 mg vardenafil ) administer , respectively . After single oral dose phosphodiesterase type 5 inhibitor ( PDE5I ) , plasma level parent major metabolite measure 24 48 h .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject whose CYP3A5 genotype determine Subject whose CYP3A5 genotype determine
